sources.title: Neuberger Berman Pushes Lions Gate to End Dual-Class Share (1)
sources.snippet: Neuberger Berman submitted a shareholder proposal to Lions Gate Entertainment Corp., advocating for an end to the dual-class voting structure at the company ahead of a spinoff of its studio business.. The investment manager owns 0.02% of the company's class A shares and 4.4% of the non-voting class B shares, according to a statement and Bloomberg calculations.
